DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect dietary protein blood lipid gut hormone fat-rich meal . Hypothesis : Certain dietary protein reduce amount fat circulate blood stream follow fat rich meal . The effect dependant quality quantity protein ingest .

DOC.criteria: BMI > 30 kg/m2 & < 45 kg/m2 Diabetes lipid lower drug Liver , Kidney and/or Heart Disease Serious Hypertension ( 160/110 )
